snippet: Members of the mob killed the three in Madagascar because they suspected them of trafficking human organs after a dead child was found on a beach, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Two Europeans and local man are killed by angry mob on Madagascar island of Nosy Be, for their alleged involvement in trafficking in stolen organs after mutilated body of dead child is discovered on beach.
lead_paragraph: Members of the mob killed the three in Madagascar because they suspected them of trafficking human organs after a dead child was found on a beach, the police said Thursday.

headline.main: Madagascar: Mob Kills 2 Europeans and Local Man Over Child’s Death
headline.print_headline: Madagascar: Mob Kills 2 Europeans And Local Man Over Child’s Death
